alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 11:37AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Navajo and Coconino Counties through 100 PM MDT/NOON MST/... At 1236 PM MDT/1136 AM MST/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Winslow, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Winslow and Homolovi State Park Campground. This includes the following highways... Business Interstate 40 between mile markers 252 and 257. Interstate 40 between mile markers 241 and 260. State Route 87 between mile markers 341 and 349. State Route 99 between mile markers 42 and 58. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County
